description:
Aphrodite of Pisces takes Athena to the Sanctuary by order of the Grand Master, where both will meet face to face. What secret does the Grand Master hide behind his tears? Meanwhile, Mayura has detected that the remains of Eris are producing an effect that could be catastrophic.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Colliding Souls! Saori vs. Grand Master
